revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DI-624 |revision=B1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/14/2003 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA25212G |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |cpu1_brand=NEC |cpu1_model=µPD30131;VR4131; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Global Sun GL2454MP-0A |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5212 |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR5111 |wi1_chip3_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip3_model=AR2111 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=ThreadX;G4.0.4.0; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} The FCC ID for this device is the ID for the ''Global Sun'' wireless module. :The module is silkscreened with "GL5254MP-0A0" and "T1.1" on the front of the board in the FCC photos. :"2626034-01R 3-5" is silkscreened on the back in the same photos. :The FCC label states the device as ''2.4GHz Wireless 54Mbps Mini PCI'', '''Model Name: GL2454MP-0A'''
[http://www.wireless-forum.ch/forum/viewtopic.php?t=3156 FCC ID mention for this model] :[http://www.dslreports.com/faq/13452 B2 may use the same FCC ID] (w/ 00:80:C8 OUI?)
===Stock firmware=== The firmware download for this device is identical to that of the A1 revision. .. as such, it's presumed to also use µPD30131.
*'''di-624a_125_nml.bin''' <small>(md5: ae1843fd51d14c413dabd1a62c0e5b87)</small> :- compressed ARJ file ('''NML.MEM'''), '''ThreadX''' based :'''ThreadX''' version string :- <small>'''Copyright (c) 1996-2001 Express Logic Inc. * ThreadX JADE/Green Hills Version G4.0.4.0'''</small>
